description:
In order to earn money, the Keroro Platoon volunteers Dororo to teach "how to be a ninja" classes.  But nobody shows up!  So they decide to take the classes from him themselves.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dororo Kitare Ninja Kyoushitsu e de Arimasu / Keroro no Kyouryuu de Arimasu
Les leçons de ninjutsu de Dororo / Le dinosaure de Keroro
ドロロ きたれ忍者教室へ であります / ケロロ の恐竜 であります
